name: Treehouse of Horror IV
writer: Matt Groening (created by), James L. Brooks (developed by), Matt Groening (developed by), Sam Simon (developed by), Conan O'Brien, Bill Oakley, Josh Weinstein, Greg Daniels, Dan McGrath, Bill Canterbury, Bill Canterbury (staff writer), David X. Cohen (staff writer)
actors: Dan Castellaneta, Julie Kavner, Nancy Cartwright, Yeardley Smith
plot: Homer, after seeing no more donuts in the power plant, says he would sell his soul for a donut, for the devil appears to be Ned Flanders. Whilst riding to school, Bart sees a gremlins on the side of the bus which only he can see. The Simpsons family go to Mr Burns' haunted castle where they think that Mr Burns is Count Dracula.
